entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarify documentation of Process.Start return value #109435
  • The Unix implementation of Process type is not thread safe #109434
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to gracefully terminate process #109432
  • Trim analyzer produces unexpected IL2059 for nullable enum #109429
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] Finish unimplemented parts of GetMethodDescData #109426
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] document TypeValidation and MethodValidation #109425
    10.0.0
  • SIGBUS on macOS 15.1 #109423
  • Update usage of EOL Raspbian 10 Helix container image #109420
  • [Bug] COM component using netstandard2.0 library with correct binding redirects cannot find dependency #109417
  • Issue with 'AfterTargets="Publish"' and PublishAot #109414
  • JIT: Cloned loop not fully strength reduced on arm64 #109412
    10.0.0
  • [mono] android crash in `mono_object_handle_isinst` #109410
  • Ordered evaluation in FileSystemGlobbing Matcher #109408
  • Make SocksException(SR.net_socks_connection_failed) more informative #109404
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 10/28/2024 12:13:44 AM #109421
    10.0.0
  • The same code pinvoke will not generate. dmp in. net8, but it will generate. dmp in. net4.7.2 #109402
  • DispatchProxy generates a proxy type implementing the interface from the wrong ALC #109398
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce Prefix for MeterOptions #109397
  • .NET 10 Telemetry Work Tracking #109396
    10.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Delegate GDV check is not being hoisted outside the loop #109379
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect message for IL2026 for trim-sunsafe types in XAML type info metadata table #109272
    10.0.0
  • AssemblyResolve invoked #109403
  • Type.IsSerializable and FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized are marked with Obsolete in .NET 8 #102809
    9.0.0
  • Replacement for the obsolete ObjectIDGenerator #98168
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on arm64 with comparison involving division #109337
    10.0.0
  • Culture-Info for no-No appears to differ between MacOs and Linux runtime #109409
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonPropertyName` attribute to record member declarations #109411
  • Avoid hardcoded TFM in illink #109335
  • Impossible to JsonSerialize.Serialize(IPAddress.None)? #109401
  • Support for host file system access for Blazor/WASM from NodeJS env #109355
  • WASM publish on Ubuntu 24.04 mishandles staticwebassets #109266
    9.0.1
  • Expression interpreter - Bug when passing Type.Missing to Invoke calls #15553

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set the ReferenceAssembly metadata on the manually added ReferencePath items #109433
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #109430
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • arm64: load 64bit constants from data section instead of 4 movz/k instructions #109428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make SocksException more informative #109427
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add annotations and regression testing for members accessed by legacy schema generation. #109424
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop using LINQ in Tensors #109415
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Adding info to debug WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite failure #109399
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • JIT: Fix delegate GDV for loops with multiple cloning options #109407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update ConstructorParamIncompleteBinding Exception Message #109393
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add myself to area-Infrastructure-mono in resourceManagement.yml #109419
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Use sync unwind tables on all arm64 targets #109406
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Don't assume unsigned division always produces non-negative result in value numbering #109384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Sort summary by collection name #109370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume native deps install script from arcade #109371
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Avoid a LINQ usage in tensor extensions #109405
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Generate build metadata for illink #109376
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] Fix build error for LA64. #109400
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add a note about our guaranteed string.Create behavior #109380
    needs-area-label
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ref/out keywords on arguments for shadow methods in GeneratedComInterface #109382
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking, source-generator

Updated

  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: account for newly unreachable blocks in morph #109394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type #109392
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9/0] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Improve handling of encoding of X.520 attributes #109349
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add TryAdd and TryGetValue overloads with `out int index` to OrderedDictionary #109324
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
  • dotnet format won't newline an empty catch block #44564
  • SDK doesn't find/use bundled library-packs when additional NuGet sources are specified. #44547
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]After running "dotnet workload update" and clicking "No" first and then "Yes" on UAC prompt, Unhandled exception " Workload update failed:System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Workload version 9.0.100-servicing.24530.1..., was not found." occurs #44546
    10.0.1xx
  • [Aspire]: Stopping a resource on windows always exits ungracefully (exit code 1) #44544
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch changing files in a leaf node project causes the entire project hierarchy to process to exit #44543
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch kills process tree on windows and does not let DCP cleanup containers #44542
    9.0.2xx

Closed

  • dotnet-watch: HotReloadProfile not detected correctly on unrestored app #44044
  • dotnet-watch: Investigate CI test failure: RuntimeProcessLauncherTests.UpdateAppliedToNewProcesses #42612
  • [Aspire]: Dashboard does not show logs when using dotnet watch #44319
  • Dotnet watch pops browser and asks for auth token, but token is never printed to the console #44259
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch IDE protocol doesn't update any process state #44318

PullRequests

Created

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove source build warn on diff test infra #44569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor source build tests to used common extracted sdk #44568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent propagation of Ctrl+C to child processes #44565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove prep-source-build.sh invocation from vmr devcontainer config #44548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-consider, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #75693
  • Contextual Intellisense / Autocomplete Settings Grid #75692
  • Suggested changes to VS2022 shortcuts (highly recommended) #75691
  • C# analysis background code analysis #75690
  • Show autocompletion for implementing the methods of an interface that have default implementations #75689
  • Custom Grouping of methods and properties in IntelliSense #75688
  • Generate Type should also be able to generate a record #75687
  • Comment option in the settings in VS VB #75686
  • Searching for References should have a simply UI button that excludes references from unit test projects #75685
  • ```IsWellKnownTypeUnmanagedType``` helper in `C#` compiler fails to filter out generic types. #75681
  • Error when CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath is a relative path #75680
  • C# Source Generator - The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #75679
  • No nullable warning when combining static generic fields and nullable generic type instantiations #75677
  • Change Signature broken when using Primary Constructors #75676

Closed

  • [MemberNotNull] isn't respected on local functions #56256
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: No IntelliSense pop-ups within interpolation expressions #70918
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35430.275 #75678
  • Nullability mismatch in non-`ref` foreach cannot be suppressed #75430
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • MEF Export IServiceBroker #75694
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution #75684
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Proffer project system query service #75682
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Explicit call to `UseRouting()` may break some scenarios #58733
  • Correlation/Nonce cookies accummulated causing Nginx Request Header Or Cookie Too Large #58731
  • Using Blazor Web App template in dotnet 8. Upload component doesn't fire "onChange" event #58729
  • [StaticWebAssets] Design time support/contract for tooling #58728
    .NET 10 Planning
  • HttpNoContentOutputFormatter is not working when action is type of Task or void #58727
  • Improving current methods for setting OpenAPI response descriptions with Minimal APIs #58724
  • Enhance OpenAPI support in Minimal API with ProducesDefault for default responses #58723
  • Contributing docs for JetBrains Rider users #58722

Closed

  • .NET 8 migration from WASM to Blazor Web App - environment not set correctly #53832
    9.0.0
  • QuickGrid error: A second operation was started on this context instance before a previous operation completed #58669
  • Allow OpenAPI's response descriptions to be set using Minimal API #57963
  • [Blazor] css isolation does not work if the class is set to an element inside a loop #58540
  • Different model binding behaviour for nullable query params with default value in asp net core #57705

PullRequests

Created

  • Replaced Deprecated str.substr with str.substring in All Relevant Files #58732
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.1
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI iOS looking for obfuscar imeplementation doesn't works #25636
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding doesn't support MVVM properly #25634
  • Collection View not populating with Observable Collection in Android #25633
  • [iOS] UseSafeArea is not working when ControlTemplate is set #25630
  • MAUI Canvas Drawing Slow on Android not iOS #25628
  • Maui Android WebView ShouldOverrideUrlLoading is not calling when we set CustomWebViewClient #25626
  • The version of package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms isn't update to 9.0.0. #25623
  • Error Cannot create an IOS archive . Process cannot be executed on XMA server #25622
  • iOS App Randomly Crashing with Memory Leak During Large Data Load, Navigation, and Save Operations #25621

Closed

  • [0:] Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout has been Garbage Collected. #25538
  • [Grid] Using Grid.Resources inside Grid (e.g. for Buttons, Labels, ...) with just some Properties set (e.g. HorizontalOptions or TextAlignment) overwrites global Style entirely #19882
  • Mac catalyst web view is not working #24860
  • Add check for `Shell` so if users try to push to it or not set it as the root we throw a more helpful exception #25423
  • ImageButton wrong size and missing border on Android #25034
  • Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are supported when opening browser #25625
  • Massive Problems with random crashes (SIGSEGV and SIGABRT) #21479
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid different rendering on different platforms #25464
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Shell Flyout header spacing and dynamic height issue on iOS #25435

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Build maui.aar with the new AndroidGradleProject item #25632
  • Test disabling propagation for ScrollView #25629
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Testing] Reenable test ported from Xamarin.UITest #25624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Merged

  • [main] Merge release 9.0.1xx to main #25589
  • Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25613
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update some versions for ga #25616
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25569
    area-testing

    area-testing

Updated

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517

  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140

  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • Try skip provisionator #25615
  • [X] Delay binding context type check until relative binding source is resolved #25600
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1

  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [Testing] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled - UI Test #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - UI-Test #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: invalid SQL generated when doing join with nested anonymous key selectors #35028
  • Investigate potential overhead of using pre-compiled queries in non-AOT mode #35027
  • Analyzer: Warn about missing indexes on queries #35026
  • ComplexType properties disappear when using TPC mapping #35025
  • Query could not be translated when using a static ICollection/IList field #35024
  • Removing HierarchyId with existing migrations breaks compilation #35022

Closed

  • Cosmos: Average truncates results #26378
    10.0.0
  • Should I use foreign keys for a composite primary key? #35008
  • How may I resolve? #35012
  • ToListAsync returns wrong amount of rows when using TemporalAll and list projection #34978
  • Get latest version of all from temporal table, with include. #34384

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use the proper type mapping for the result of AVG #35023
